title: Qualcomm Fellowship Award
content:
Qualcomm Fellowship Award
제안서 제출마감이 10일 앞으로 다가 왔습니다.
분야에 대해서는 포괄적인 의미로 해석해 주시면 좋겠습니다.
즉, ‘wireless’는 mobile, communication 을 포함하며,
Intelligent web
등도 ‘multimedia’에 포함될 수 있습니다.
또한, hardware와 software 모두 포함합니다.
Award
10 Million Korean Won each for 8 KAIST graduate students (4 teams, 2 students per team) based on the merits of team research proposals (Small additional funding will be provided to supervising professor’s lab.)
Proposal
Topics of Interests: Technologies and ideas relevant to wireless and multimedia Research
Period: from June 1st, 2011 to May 31st, 2012
Page limit: 2 pages with concise and detailed content
List supervising professor
Evaluation Criteria
Innovative and creative research topic
Impact to wireless and multimedia industry
Feasibility and execution of proposed research
Eligibility
KAIST graduate students graduating after May 2012
Selection Process
May 1, 2011: Submit 2-page proposal to
QualcommFellowshipAward@neuron.kaist.ac.kr
May 10, 2011: Notification of 10 finalist teams
May 20, 2011: Finalists’ presentation to selection committee
May 21, 2011: Announcement of the winning Awardees
Commitment / Obligation
Opportunity to present and participate in two workshops (Fall 2011 & Spring 2012)
Opportunity to discuss and collaborate with Qualcomm Korea R&D Center
NO OBLIGATION. THIS IS AN AWARD.
For more information please visit
http://bsrc.kaist.ac.kr/QCFellowship
or contact to
QualcommFellowshipAward@neuron.kaist.ac.kr
(tel.: 042-350-8491)
